about_the_game:
Purchase the Ultimate Upgrade to get three additional Outfit Packs for Max, as well as the Exclusive Cat Content.

The Ultimate Upgrade contains:

  • Final Fantasy VII Outfit Pack
  • Fan Favorite Outfit Pack
  • Paw Prints Cat Outfit Pack
  • Exclusive Cat Content

Each Outfit Pack lets you change up Max’s look with 4 new indoor outfits and a coat, with one new indoor outfit available for Max to wear in each chapter of the story.

You can change Max’s Outfit Pack at the dresser in her apartment, and at the start of every new chapter.

* Please note: the Spooky Outfit Pack and Decades Outfit Pack are only available to purchase in the Deluxe Upgrade, and are not contained in the Ultimate Upgrade.

FINAL FANTASY VII OUTFIT PACK
Max is living in a Materia world, with outfits incorporating unforgettable creatures and monsters from the Final Fantasy VII saga! This pack contains the Moogle coat and four indoor outfits: Chocobo, Cactuar, Bomb, and Tonberry.

FAN FAVORITE OUTFIT PACK
Dive deep into the franchise you love with fresh fits conjured from Arcadia Bay, Haven Springs, and the backwoods of Seattle. This pack contains the Hawt Dawg Man coat and four indoor outfits: Free Bird, Classic Doe, Wolf Squad, and Misfit Skull.

PAW PRINTS CAT OUTFIT PACK
Get your claws into this purrfectly indulgent selection of carnivorous couture! This pack contains the Leopard Print Camo coat and four indoor outfits: Awesome Pawsome, Peek Purple, Feline Fine, and Hang In There.

EXCLUSIVE CAT CONTENT
When Max discovers a lost cat on her back porch, she knows she must reunite it with its owner. But until then, she’ll need to take care of a skittish and unpredictable guest in her apartment…

This bonus content requires the base game Life is Strange: Double Exposure in order to play.

All additional items, including all three Outfit Packs and the Exclusive Cat Content, will be available at launch of the base game.

FINAL FANTASY and FINAL FANTASY VII are registered trademarks or trademarks of Square Enix Holdings Co., Ltd.

short_description: Upgrade to Ultimate to add three exclusive Outfit Packs and cat content!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian, German*, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
